text: Gerhard Neuser (29 October 1938 – 7 August 1993) was a German footballer. He made 143 appearances in the Bundesliga for Schalke 04. == References == == External links == * Category:1938 births Category:1993 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Bundesliga players Category:FC Schalke 04 players Category:Sportfreunde Siegen players
title: Gerhard Neuser
